bibl.title: The Money Economy and the Ptolemaic Peasantry.
bibl.note: The Ptolemaic coinage system in its impact on the fellahin. What we have is an economy in which currency did not serve as the only, or even the major, standard of exchange.
bibl.seg: Samuel Alan E., The Money Economy and the Ptolemaic Peasantry.
The Ptolemaic coinage system in its impact on the fellahin. What we have is an economy in which currency did not serve as the only, or even the major, standard of exchange.
